markdown-examples.title: Markdown Examples (Yep, that is for h1 title!)
markdown-examples.excerpt: Markdown is a very simple text formating for the web. Originally conceived by daring fireball, it has catch a very wide audience all interwebs due to its eligibility and expressiveness unlike any other before.
